concept.title: What is a schema language
concept.shortdesc: A schema language describes the structure of an XML document The XML schema language is also referred to as XML Schema Definition (XSD)

section.title: Purpose of an XML schema
section.p:
The purpose of an XML Schema is to define the legal building blocks of an XML document:
the elements and attributes that can appear in a document
the number of (and order of) child elements
data types for elements and attributes
default and fixed values for elements and attributes
